result.execSummary:
The defendant Amy Lynn Castellanos was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Bond previously posted in the amount of $250.00 has been applied.  The remaining balance of the Costs are to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amy Lynn Castellanos

defendant.name: Castellanos, Amy Lynn
defendant.address: N10766 Red River Rd, Birnamwood, WI 54414

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Case Called @ 3:29 PM: Defendant Amy Lynn Castellanos in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel. Def does not wish counsel today, believes counsel is not needed and she is prepared to enter a GP.  Def requests to speak with the State prior to deciding on counsel issue.  Off Record for Def to speak with ADA.  Back of Record at 3:33 PM:  Agreement recited by ADA.    Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Plea (OAR):  NC  Court accepts plea and enters JOC.  Statement by Def: None offered.  The Court:  Imposes Court Costs w/DNA - Bond to apply - 60 DTP or PP on balance.  Appeal Rights Given.  Court notes that Def will be eligible in June for reinstatement of her DL.

citations.chargeDescr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
